headings: Interested in more information on becoming Ram Ready?
paragraphs: Earn your degree in social work right where you are!

The Ram Ready Social Work program is a partnership with San Antonio College (SAC) designed to help you achieve your educational goals. We are committed to maximizing your transfer credits, while at the same time minimizing the cost and time required to earn both your associate and bachelor’s degrees.
Our Bachelor of Social Work (B.S.W.) degree prepares you for licensure as a Licensed Baccalaureate Social Worker (LBSW).

Once you have applied for admission to ASU and been admitted, you will need to meet with theRam Ready Social Work advisorto ensure you have completed the appropriate steps to apply for admission into theASU B.S.W. Program.
Along with the student support services available at your home institution, you will also have access to the following services at Angelo State:
View the full list of student support services

You’ll learn from experts in their field and have to opportunity to pursue research projects or professional presentations with faculty guidance that will help prepare you for your career or graduate school.
Also, consider joining our social work faculty and students on the annual summer study abroad trip to places such as Austria, Czech Republic, Germany, the Netherlands and Romania!
Follow these steps to become Ram Ready:
Courses are available to take online.
You will also be required to complete B.S.W. Field Education hours through field placement. The B.S.W. field director will assist you in locating your field placement.

The purpose of field education is to provide opportunities for you to apply social work knowledge, skills, values, and cognitive and affective processes learned in the classroom to real-life situations with clients “in the field.”

You will be responsible for the tuition and fees for the course(s) enrolled through ASU. You will be required to pay account balances through your RamPort account by the published deadlines and in accordance with the institution’s payment policies.
Tuition and Fees

At Angelo State, we’re committed to making your college experience one of the best investments you’ll ever make. We’ll provide you with a high-quality education at a cost that will help you graduate in four years (or less!) with as little debt as possible.
Paying for College
Earn ourASU Distinguished Transfer Scholarshipbased on your transfer GPA and number of transferable credit hours. When you are admitted to ASU, you are automatically considered for this scholarship.
Additionally, you can submit a single application to be considered for both our general and degree-specific scholarships.
